name: Data Analyst

address.raw: Краснодар, микрорайон Центральный, улица Дмитриевская Дамба, 7

description:
About the vacancy

This London-based client is one of the world's most established stock exchanges. DataArt is working with multiple business units, helping the customer to re-architect key aspects of its data infrastructure and business applications, including taking them to the cloud. Our scope of engagement includes modern frontend development, data streaming, data warehousing, modern APIs, and other areas.

You will be working in a team of highly skilled engineers and hands-on architects. All team members, including project managers, are hands-on, with a technical background.

We hire people not to a project, but to the company. If the project (or your work in it) is over, you go to another project or to a paid “Idle”.

Responsibilities

  • Capture business requirements across a range of business units and translate them into detailed requirements related to data models data transformation
  • Become an expert in Snowflake
  • Ensuring adherence to the client's security policies and data quality practices
  • Be a point of contact for business stakeholders in relation to the use of data & analytics in general

Must have

  • Data analysis skills
  • Expertise working with Data Warehouse, building reports
  • Skills working with data insights etc. treatment of data - e.g. sensitive data
  • Strong business intuition and ability to understand complex business systems
  • SQL and data modeling skills
  • Spoken English

Would be a plus

  • Experience in the Finance domain
  • Experience with Power BI, modern data stores, and data warehouses – Snowflake
  • Data Engineering skills and technologies – ETL tools, Python

DATAART OFFERS:

  • Professional Development:
    — Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
    — The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
    — More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
    — Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
    — Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.

  • The ability to focus on your work: a lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement, and convenient corporate services;

  • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;

  • Flexible schedule (there are core mandatory hours), the ability to work remotely upon agreement with colleagues;

  • The ability to work in any of our development centers.
